nodes.text: Skalokor was the second moon of the world Yabosta.

The moon was covered in forests and treacherous mountains, and was inhabited by the Dolandu, a sentient species of white-furred humanoids. One trading settlement on the moon was Stomorr. It was once attacked by forces under command of the Dark Jedi apprentice Von Totha who wanted to kill a Jedi Master that lived near the village. That Jedi Master, Niquon, defeated all of Totha's forces except for a drethi, a winged creature with Force-targeting poison. The drethi was finally defeated by Niquon's Padawan learner Nason Laric.
